Subsection.Text: The board shall, by rule, establish fees for the following purposes:

Paragraph.Text: An application fee, not to exceed $100.
An examination fee, not to exceed $200.
An initial licensure fee, not to exceed $200.
A biennial renewal fee, not to exceed $200.
An inactive fee, not to exceed $100.
A delinquent fee, not to exceed $100.
A reactivation fee, not to exceed $100.
A voluntary inactive fee, not to exceed $100.

Subsection.Text: The board shall establish fees at a level, not to exceed the statutory fee cap, that is adequate to ensure the continued operation of the regulatory program under this part. The board shall neither set nor maintain the fees at a level that will substantially exceed this need.
